title: Canary Layout - NAV Layer with Arrows

rules.description: Language switching (Left Cmd + R = Canary, Left Cmd + E = Russian)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "SystemUIServer" to click (first menu bar item whose description is "text input") of menu bar 1' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "SystemUIServer" to click menu item "Canary" of menu 1 of result'

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "SystemUIServer" to click (first menu bar item whose description is "text input") of menu bar 1' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "SystemUIServer" to click menu item "Russian" of menu 1 of result'

rules.description: Russian layout hotkeys mapped to Canary positions (Cmd/Ctrl/Alt)
